description: This file defines API routes related to assessments, demonstrating Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) enforcement using FastAPI. It includes endpoints to list, create, and delete assessments, with security dependencies that restrict access based on user roles.

methods.name: list_assessments
methods.description: Returns a static list of assessments, accessible to users with roles in READ_ROLES.

methods.name: create_assessment
methods.description: Creates and returns an assessment echo payload with a fake id, accessible to users with roles in WRITE_ROLES.

methods.name: delete_assessment
methods.description: Deletes an assessment by id, accessible to users with roles in ADMIN_ROLES.
